mapper.select: SELECT D.BG_ID, D.GROUP_NAME, COUNT(D.BLOG_ID) GROUP_NUM FROM (SELECT A.BLOG_ID,IFNULL(C.BG_ID,-1) BG_ID,IFNULL(C.GROUP_NAME,'未分组') GROUP_NAME FROM (SELECT B.BLOG_ID FROM BLOG_ARTICLE B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.STATE_CD = '1') A LEFT JOIN (SELECT G.BG_ID,G.GROUP_NAME,UG.BLOG_ID FROM BLOG_GROUP G,USER_BLOG_GROUP UG WHERE G.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UG.BG_ID=G.BG_ID) C ON C.BLOG_ID=A.BLOG_ID) D GROUP BY D.BG_ID,D.GROUP_NAME ORDER BY D.BG_ID DESC
